title: 求SelectedItem用法
author: creative
txt_content:
SelectedItem
官方解释
Contains the item data of the item currently held in the player's hand
玩家正在拿着一个包含该物品数据的物品Added to compact the process of testing if a player is holding a specific item
将使测试玩家手持一个特定的物品的过程更简单Previous method required nine commands in command blocks; now requires only one command
以前的方法需要九个在命令方块里的命令；现在只需要一个命令求用法（如果我神翻译请无视）{:10_509:}

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217559&extra跟testfor @a {SelectedItemSlot:格子,Inventory:[{id:物品,Count:数量b,Slot:格子b,Damage:附加值s}]}是一样的吗= =,可是Inventory却是探测玩家背包的，SelectedItemSlot探测格子，SelectedItem则是探测选中格子+物品，根据官方解释应该是SelectedItemSlot需要探测9个格子，而SelectedItem只用探测一次就可以输出求解答- -
